IRPact_modellierung.network

Class RandomRewireTMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.network.TopologyManipulationScheme
      • IRPact_modellierung.network.RandomRewireTMS

  • public class RandomRewireTMS
extends TopologyManipulationScheme
    TopologyManipulationScheme that randomly rewires the edges in the network, i.e. with a certain probability changes the source and target of an edge uniformly, as long as no other edge lies between the new source and target.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class IRPact_modellierung.network.TopologyManipulationScheme

      void manipulateTopology(SimulationContainer simulationContainer, SocialGraph socialGraph)

    • Method Detail

      • getRewireProbability

        public double getRewireProbability()

      • manipulateTopology

        public void manipulateTopology(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                               SocialGraph socialGraph)
        With this scheme, the topology is manipulated by uniformly replacing edges with a certain probability. Edges get replaced by an edge that is not yet in the graph and that is either not self-referential or self-referentiality is given in the graph
        Specified by:
        manipulateTopology in class TopologyManipulationScheme
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container the simulation takes place in
        socialGraph - The graph that is to be manipulated
